metadata.title: CVE-2019-11888 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Go through 1.12.5 on Windows mishandles process creation with a nilenvironment in conjunction with a non-nil token, which allows attackers toobtain sensitive information or gain privileges.

criterions.comment: golang-1.10: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
